TEXT.S:
Namibiau Namibiasa ilabu nu Africa, itiza i 22 00 S, 17 00 E, u ahebal nu lala' mapulung sa 824,292 km2, u ahebal nu lala'ay sa 823,290 km2, u ahebal nu nanumay sa 1,002 km2, hamin nu tademaw sa 2,436,469. kakalukan umah sa 47.20%, kilakilangan umah sa 8.80%, zumaay henay umah sa 44%.
tapang tusu nu kanatalu tapang tusu nu kanatal sa u Windhoek.
kakininan nu kanatal demiadkakining nu kanatal demiad sa tusa bataan bulad tulu demiad.
tabakiay a tapang nu kanatalu tabakiay a tapang nu kanatal (congtung) ayza sa ci Hage Geingob (Hake.Kenkepu ·), 1941 a mihca 8 a bulad 3 a demiad nalecuhan. u tabakiay a tapang nu kanatal (congtung) nu Namibiaayza, micakat a demiad sa i 2015 a mihca 3 bulad 21 demiad.
cunliu cunli nu Namibiaayza sa ci Saara Kuugongelwa (·), micakat a demiad sa i 2015 a mihcaan 3 bulad 21 demiad.
Namibia 16001000~1500 naw Sinan Fa-cuo, amisan malecad tu Anke-la (Angola, Zambiamababiyaw, walian, timulan biyaw tu Puoca-na (Botswanaatu Na-fai (South Africa, nutipan micapi tu Ta-siyung. lilis nu bayu tanayu' makaala tu cacay a malebut enem (1600) a lasubu a kun-li. hamin nu niyadu'ay a kitidaan nu talakaw cacay a malebut (1000) katukuh cacay a malebut lima a lasubu (1500) a lawat.
nutipan mililisay tu batu atu walian nu labu a niyaduan u likennan, amis u enal. anganganan nu sauwac idaw ku Aw-lance sauwac (Orange, Ku'-nene sauwacatu Awka-wan-ke sauwac. 15~1818901915 sabaw tu lima (15) katukuh sabaw walu (18) a seci,Pu-tawya (Portugal,Ing-kuo (United Kingdomcaculalculal sa midebung. cacay a malebut walu a lasubu siwa a bataan (1890) a mihcaan midebung ku De-kuo (Germany. cacay a malebut siwa a lasubu cacay a bataan idaw ku lima (1915) a mihcaan, Na-fai (South Africamilihida tu Siye-Kuomisuayaw tu De-kuo (Germanymalpacaw, tahekal kuhitay midebung tu Sina Fa-cuo. 19201949 cacay a malebut siwa a lasubu tusa a bataan (1920) a mihcaan, kanatal lanmung paida'tu Na-fai (South Africamikuwan tu Sinan Fa-cuo. cacay a malebut siwa a lasubu sepat a bataan idaw ku siwa (1949) a mihcaan, Na-fai (South Africamialaw tu Sinan Fa-cuo. 19604 cacay a malebut siwa a lasubu enem a bataan (1960) a mihcaan sepatay a bulad, Sinan Fa-cuoa tademaw patideng kunuheni misakaput, malingatu mialaw tu binacadan amisiteked masasuada'. 19661968 cacay a malebut siwa a lasubu enem a bataan idaw ku enem (1966) a mihcaan, Lanhe-kuomidui tu kawaw nuheni, alesen nuheni ku Na-faimisuayaway tu Sinan Fa-cuomamikuwan. cacay a malebut siaw a lasubu enem a bataan idaw ku walu (1968) a mihcaan, Lanhe-kuotahun saansa tu Sinan Fa-cuoa tademaw nabalucuan tu Sinan Fa-cuomisumad tu ngangan u Namibia. 1978435 cacay a malebut siwa a lasubu pitu a bataan idaw ku walu (1978) a mihcaan , Lanhe-kuomalaheci ku sepatay a lasubu tulu a bataan idaw ku lima (435) a sasulitan, patideng tu Namibiaami siteked sa. 19891990321 cacay a malebut siwa a lasubu walu a bataan idaw ku siwa(1989) a mihcaan, itini i Lanhe-kuonikantukan palekal tu cesin ihunatu pisinkiwan nu Cuotun, zncutanmaala, sasinkiwan ci Nucew-makumaalaay mala Cuotun. cacay a malebut siwa a lasubu siwa a bataan (1990) a mihcaan tulu a bulat tusa a bataan idaw ku cacay a demiad mihapu tu misiteked.
tukay
Wun-heke'u Nami-yiaa sudu, cen-ce, sakaudip, lalangawan, telungan nu sasiwbayan, Nami-yiamisatekeday a tukay -- Sewaw-kepu-munde-- Nami-yiasasinganganay nu hapin a tukay. nutipan micapi tu satabakiay nu Nan-taypin-yung, waliyan micapitu hatidaay nu malebut a Nay-mipu' likenlikenan. 3703 masilud ku liklik, bangcal ku pala, sakadihkuwan sa ku demiad, mahida u Europeku kapah. sasiwbayan, mabawbaw ku kataydaan a midang, u Nami-yiaku tataydaan nu kadihkuwan aaidangan. mibatad tu sudu tu tulu a lasubu pitu (370) a kunli. tademaw han tulu (3) a mang ku pinapina, mala tulu nu cacay ku De-i' Germanya laylay. 1892 cacay a malebut walu a lasubu siwa a bataan tusa (1892) a mihcaan patideng tu tukay. nani debungan nu De-kuoheniay, naw Sinan Fa-cuonu anganganan a minatu, nikudan satu u Wuo-elwi-sewan ) kumi kawaway.
Walvis dadisapan 11245 Nami-yiasatabakiay nu sailabuay a minatu, taneng pasaluimeng tu mang dun nu tabakiay a balunga. kitidaan makaala tu cacay a malebut cacay a lasubu tusa a bataan idaw ku sepat (1124) a pinfun kunli, tademaw han makaala tu lima (5) a mang ku pina. ""10 idaw ku silamalay makayda i Nami-tiatu Na-fai,u dadan atu liklik lima a kanatal masasuala. sipangangan han tu Uyel disapan (Whale Bay ), Na-cicuo (AntarcticaBenguela (Penke-la ) nusienaway idaw kunipiladay tu silaculay nu munabaway a langaw taamisen katukuh itinibabutingan matatungus, tu mihmihcaan idawtu ku tabakiay a buting, kya kasinganganan. 1487 cacay a malebut sepat a lasubu walu a bataan idaw ku pitu(1487) a mihcaan Putaw-yapacunaay tu balunga a tademaw ci Diya-sesayaway mkatukuh, nikudan satu malawan nu Ing-kuoatu Na-faiamidebung, palekalan Fai-cuou angangangan a minatu. 1990199431 cacay a malebut siwa alasubu siwa a bataan (1990) a mihcaan Nami-timisiteked satu u Na-faikina midebungay, katukuh tu cacay a malebut siwa a lasubu siwa a bataan idaw ku sepat a mihcaan tulu a balat cacay a demiad kiya panukas i Nami-ti, pakasingangan tu Fai-cuosakasidatengan tu caaya kaw malimaday sa.
Sesriem likenlikenan 500"" i kitakit numukasi hena a likenlikenan, Nami-yianupicidekan a aaidangan. itida i Nay-mipu likenlikenannu teban, micapi tu Na-nasuodu nu Wen-heke'tu lima a lasubu a kun-li. masabuyuay nu liken yadah ku mukin. mapacilal satu sumanah saan, singangan sa "sumanahay a liken" 325 alahican sinanum, mulangaway sa u caay katalaw tu kedalay nu likenlikenan a langaw, sawsawni idaw ku sidi, zu, katalan atu tula a tahekal. itini nu kitakitan satalakaway a masabuyu'ay a liken, makaalatu talakaw han tulu a lasubu tusa a bataan idaw kulima (325) a lawad. "45"45 sepat a bataan idaw ku lima (45) a banggu nu masabuyu'ay a liken silaad tu sacumud nu aaidangan sepat a bataan idaw kulima (45) a kunli ku sasinganganan, tada bangcal tu ku taykaku atu bangcalay demiad sisa pangangan han tu kitakitay a bangcalay nu masabuyuay a likenlikenan. ""Dead Vlei "kapatayan nu dihep (Dead Vlei " u Suse-seli a likenlikenannu i sasaay a cikacikahan, tataydaan miadih tu katahekalan nu cidal, tahceleman nu cilal atu malebutay nu kilang a ba'tuay nu tataydaan midang, tu mihmihcaan kutuud ku namakaydaay i O-miamiliwkuay atu manamuhay amisasingay nu tayda tayni itini midang.
Aytaw-sa kanatal a aidangan 2.21907195610 satabakiay nu Fai-cuo, satenesay nu likisi a pahutinan a aadupan, kakitidaan makaala tu 22,000 km2. cacay a malebut siwa a lasubu idaw ku pitu (1907) a mihcaan mala dadiputan nu aadupan, nina dadadipudan ahebalahebal ku kitidaan, katukuh tu cacay a malibut siwa lasubu lima a bataan idaw ku enem (1956) a mihcaan makaala tu 100,000 km2, namala nu satabakiay nu kitakit a papahutinan a dadiputan nu aadupan. 5000--"" 300 ilabu idaw ku cacaya a kitidaan makaala tu 500 km2 nu tabakiay isasaay nu cikahcikahan Ay-tawsa enal. kaudadan idaw ku nanum micumud, liklik tu mihcaan idaw ku tulu a lasubu ku maudipay nu Fai-cuopahutinan a aadupan, malamel tu kainaian tu nu lumeniay a katalan atu lumeniay a bihid nu sidi atu Fai-cuonu zuan. 340 ilabu kapulungan nu ayam han makaala tu tilu a lasubu sepat a bataan ku pinapina a aayaman. nina niyadu u Na-Fai-cuoa Huole-ayamnu kadabuan pisawawaan a kitidaan. tumihcaan kaudadan sa, pina nu magan a Huole-ayamtaynitini madabu mulecuh. tayniay midang taneng makadideng micumud miadih tu aadupan.
